container.heading: Exhaustion of Administrative Remedies and Judicial Review

section.heading: Exhaustion of Administrative Remedies.
section.text: An aggrieved party shall exhaust all administrative remedies provided in this subtitle before seeking judicial review.

section.heading: Judicial Review.
section.text: A decision of the Appeals Board is subject to judicial review in accordance with the provisions of the Administrative Procedure Act governing contested cases.

annotations.annotation: State Finance and Procurement Article, §§12-101 and 15-201—15-223, Annotated Code of Maryland
Effective date: July 1, 1981 (8:13 Md. R. II-5)
Chapter revised effective January 9, 1989 (15:27 Md. R. 3138)
